text: Python program to find fibonacci series.
There is another thread to discuss Fibo series in Python.
This is to tweak code into more pythonic.
How to write the Fibonacci Sequence in Python

childList.text: How to write the Fibonacci Sequence in Python

text: I am in love with this program I wrote to solve Project Euler Q2.
I am newly coding in Python and rejoice each time I do it The Pythonic way!
Can you suggest a better Pythonic way to do this?
Find the sum of all the even-valued terms in the Fibonacci sequence which do not exceed four million.

code:
fib=[]
def fibo(a=-1,b=1,upto=4000000):
    if a+b>=upto:
        return
    else:
        a,b=b,a+b
        fib.append(b)
        fibo(a,b)

fibo()
even=[i for i in fib if not i%2]
print sum(even)
